name: Kyoungwoo Lee
content: Kyoungwoo Lee Skip to content Associate Professor Affiliation : Dependable Computing Lab. in the Department of Computer Science, Yonsei University (Homepage : http://dclab.yonsei.ac.kr) E-mail : kyoungwoo.lee AT yonsei.ac.kr Phone : +82-2-2123-5710 Location : Room D822, Building 121, 50 Yonsei-ro, Seodaemun-gu, Seoul, Korea Biography 2008, ph.D , Information and Computer Science, University of California at Irvine 1997, M.S, Computer Science, Yonsei University, Seoul, Korea 1995, B.S, Computer Science, Yonsei University, Seoul, Korea Research Interest Dependable Embedded Systems for Everyday Computing Effective Software Management on Scratchpad Memory Collaborative Sensing Various Contexts in Human Life Assistive IoT Solutions for Patients in Clinical Approaches Privacy-protected Video Processing in Resource-constrained Environments
